description: Describes the status of the assignment creation request.

parameters.name: InstanceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the IAM Identity Center instance under which the operation will be executed. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and Amazon Web Services Service Namespaces in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

parameters.name: AccountAssignmentCreationRequestId
parameters.description: The identifier that is used to track the request operation progress.

nested_items.name: AccountAssignmentCreationStatus
nested_items.description: The status object for the account assignment creation operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the permission set provisioning process.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The identifier for tracking the request operation that is generated by the universally unique identifier (UUID) workflow.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The message that contains an error or exception in case of an operation failure.

nested_items.name: TargetId
nested_items.description: TargetID is an Amazon Web Services account identifier, (For example, 123456789012).

nested_items.name: TargetType
nested_items.description: The entity type for which the assignment will be created.

nested_items.name: PermissionSetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the permission set. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and Amazon Web Services Service Namespaces in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: PrincipalType
nested_items.description: The entity type for which the assignment will be created.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: An identifier for an object in IAM Identity Center, such as a user or group. PrincipalIds are GUIDs (For example, f81d4fae-7dec-11d0-a765-00a0c91e6bf6). For more information about PrincipalIds in IAM Identity Center, see the IAM Identity Center Identity Store API Reference.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The date that the permission set was created.
